channel.title: Stillgfx height?
channel.description:
k i need a little help with this
my stillgfx and stillgfx2 only have id x and y
while others have height and time...can somebody post those voids with height and time in it?
thanx

item.title: Stillgfx height?
item.dc:creator: @unnown unnown
item.description:
@unnown wrote:

yeah that’s it thank you so much

Read full topic

item.title: Stillgfx height?
item.dc:creator: @silabsoft RuneAgent
item.description:
@silabsoft wrote:

this?

ublic void stillgfx2(int id, int heightS, int Y, int X, int timeBCS){
		outStream.createFrame(85);
		outStream.writeByteC(Y - (mapRegionY * 8));
		outStream.writeByteC(X - (mapRegionX * 8));
		outStream.createFrame(4);
		outStream.writeByte(0);//Tiles away (X >> 4 + Y & 7)
		outStream.writeWord(id);//Graphic id
		outStream.writeByte(heightS);
		outStream.writeWord(timeBCS);//Time before casting the graphic
	}

Read full topic
